phrases: It appeared as though humanity would be destroyed by the demons.
But a single mage saved them all.
He was called the Wizard King, and he became a legend.
The fifth round of the Royal Knights Selection Exam finally concluded.
Picture Magic: Twin Storms of Fire and Water!
But I have not quite managed the ultimate painting yet.
The sixth round was about to begin.
Make sure you do not go running off on your own.
Let us hit'them with our best performances!
And now, for the sixth round of stage one!
Both teams are concentrating their attacks at the center
of the battlefield for a magic slugfest.
Steel Creation Magic: Full Metal Fortress!
He added a page to his grimoire and evolved the spell.
How is his spell so destructive?
This is not a junior-level fight.
Luck and I have done tons of missions over the last few months,
and we have gotten tougher every time!
Are not no way we are still junior-level!
He is always had intermediate skills,
but apparently, he is gotten stronger.
But that goes for me, too.
Following Asta's example, I trained my magic, my body, and my spirit!
Even if my hard work may betray me...
I will not betray my hard work!
Steel Creation Magic: Blazing Spiral Lance!
I guess you are not just some four-eyes who is too serious and worries too much!
After this fight is over, you should fight me!
He is left the crystal behind him.
We will bust through our three opponents and destroy the crystal in a single rush!
That is an attack for the enemy...
And a tailwind for my allies!
it is individual power differences that separate victory and defeat.
My spell did not even faze him.
Man, that was so much fun.
You are getting way too damn strong!
Next up, the eighth and final round of stage one...
O Team and P Team, step forward.
After we are done here, you are going on a date with me!
The Green Praying Mantises 4th Class Senior Magic Knight En Ringard
Everything will be okay if we work together.
Let us win... no matter what.
Hey, is he going to be okay?
And I heard that you grew up with Stupidsta.
I hope you are not as reckless as he is, too.
You cannot control your magic well, can you?
It looked like it took all you had to maintain
your Mana Skin at the volcano.
Can you actually think and fight, you violent peasant who is Asta's childhood friend?!
That was not even an argument.
Is Asta rubbing off on you?
Why would I ever be influenced by him?!
Come on, you two, grow up.
I think you might be the because of this, Asta.
Why do not we come up with a plan?
Who said you could touch me?!
I see you are having a friendly chat.
It is as though you think you actually have the upper hand.
The Black Bulls just happened to make a good showing for once,
and you really believe it was thanks to you?
You cannot control your magic, and despite being from the House of Silva,
you could not even make it into the Silver Eagles.
And you are going to fight me?
You are back again, shaggy bangs?!
Why cannot you do the same things as us when you are also royalty?
How dare you eat before me?
You cannot protect what is important to you because you are weak.
If you are upset, then get back at me.
If you can actually hit me with your spells, I mean.
There you are, you thieving raccoon!
We all worked so hard together.
We know you way better than that brother of yours.
Now, believe in your friends and yourself!
What is he mumbling about over there?
Maybe he is cursing that annoying brother of hers.
Make sure you do your best to run away, Noelle.
We will now begin the eighth round of stage one.
O Team: Sandler, Dimitri, and Solid versus P Team: En, Noelle, and Yuno.
You have got this, Yuno and Noelle!
Show them what the Black Bulls' women are made of!
No need to hold back just because he is your brother!
This is an annoying way to do it, but it is a shortcut with a simplified version
of that compound magic from before.
They have not moved their crystal.
They closed the distance to our crystal in one sprint.
Look at you, learning a defense spell.
It is sucking up the water.
At this rate, we will spend the whole match on the defensive.
Who gave you permission to cling to him like that?!
I am probably the fastest on this team.
I will take advantage of that and go destroy their crystal.
While I am doing that, you two somehow protect our crystal.
None of you will be going.
She is been fighting alongside Asta.
I am sure she can do it.
It is safer if I am the one protecting the crystal, anyway.
Solid's bound to come after me.
Do not go off on your own!
Hey, did you hear about the newbie with the four-leaf clover?
He actually defeated one of the Eight Shining Generals from Diamond!
That is insane for his first year!
Not only that, but when he did it,
he told the vice captain that he was going to become the Captain of the Golden Dawn.
I guess you have to be on a different level when the Wind Spirit chooses you.
It looks like Captain Vangeance has high hopes for him, too.
You are saying you are going to guard the crystal while dealing with me?
Please come at me with everything you have got.
I was not expecting an ambush.
As I was running, I fell deep into this cave.
No one will be able to rescue me here.
the figure in a painting I saw when I was little.
There is nothing to worry about now.
Master Vangeance has some other mysterious power besides magic.
A warm power that seems to connect him to his squad members.
I swore that I would devote my grimoire to his service.
I worked hard to ensure that the Golden Dawn remained the strongest squad.
We are an elite team of nobles chosen by Master Vangeance.
Why is that peasant in our midst?
Master Vangeance always interacted with all his squad members equally, and yet...
He is called him by name five times today!
Even though he has not even spoken to me once yet!
Is it because of his four-leaf clover?
The one Master Vangeance expects great things from
said that he would become captain himself.
Do not get full of yourself just because you lucked into getting spirit magic!
Getting chosen by me was part of Yuno's power!
Are you planning on fighting without my powers?
You cannot just keep defending, Noelle!
Both of us are supposed to hit the crystal together!
I will join you, and we will defeat her in one
I put some spores on you a little earlier.
I will not let you get in Noelle's way.
Now that I have caught up with you,
you do not have a chance in hell of scratching our crystal.
I would not be too sure about that!
It let us you hear my voice.
Who gave you permission to stick this thing on me?!
I heard Solid's remarks before the match.
A big brother should never say such things to his little sister.
I have ten younger brothers and sisters.
They are the ones I am fighting for.
Big brothers exist to protect the younger, weaker siblings born after them.
And yet you have only said hurtful things to her!
Do not just give him an ordinary thrashing!
Make sure he never defies you again!
Once you put them in their place, they will not turn on you.
Who is going to thrash whom, now?
There is no way a failure like you could beat me!
You have always been strong, so you probably cannot understand how weak people feel.
At this point, I do not care if you ever acknowledge me or not.
Because even greater people have acknowledged me!
I used to be really scared of your magic, Solid.
But now, it feels really flimsy.
Just keep running your mouth, you embarrassment to the House of Silva!
Water Creation Magic: Slashing Sea Serpent!
How much more do you intend to insult me?
Sand Creation Magic: Sand-Armored Heavy Guard!
This spell contains all the attack and defense powers that I have!
You think you can stop it without your spirit magic?!
I am the one who will make Master Vangeance's dream come true!
He activated his spell inside his opponent's spell?
That is what separates us from hot guys, dang it!
I do not know anything about other people's dreams.
The only dreams I see are my own.
Noelle could not cast a spell like that!
It is all right if I hit you, right?
Just go ahead and try it!
There is no way her spell could actually hit me!
She destroyed the crystal in a single blow!
In response to the incredible number of requests we got from
Charmy fans across the universe saying the seven transformations
from last time just were not enough,
I will show you that I can fight properly!
On the name of the Black Bulls, I am going to win, no matter what!
